name: Cargo Transport Driving Sim
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate euro cargo truck!! Here we bring you the best of off-roading Transport Cargo Truck Driver. You will experience euro cargo transport trucks like never before.

With many different challenging levels will test your cargo drive skills through many hard tracks of offroad environments

Features:
• Multi controllers
• Smooth handling
• Realistic physics
• Limited duration
• Different camera angles
• Tons of cargo
• Background sound effects
• Offline play
• Free download
